page.shortlink: api client api date getquarter method

return.name: quarter
return.description: The quarter (zero based) the date is in.

page.description: Extension to the native date variable to get the quarter a given date is in.

discussion.p: The Date.getQuarter method can be used to get the quarter the date is in. The quarter will be return as a zero based value - therefore if a date is in the first quarter, a value of "0" will be returned.
